text:
Mr. Frank Schooley
P-2
Underwood*s column on the network departed from a factual preÂ¬
sentation into some editorializing which I believe was out of
place and unwarranted.
So I have had my say for the day. I trust that when you go to Washington
you will ride the rails, and I will have the pleasure of seeing you there,
safe and unscathed.
Elmer G. Sulzer, Director
Radio and Television Communications
EGSsvz
cc: Mrs. Betty McKenzie
